name: Pool Together
description: PoolTogether is a deceptively simple DeFi app that incentivizes users to deposit funds with the opportunity to win prizes. In PoolTogether, there are two types of prize pools: those set up by the PoolTogether project and community prize pools that anyone can set up.

en.name: Pool Together
en.description: PoolTogether is a deceptively simple DeFi app that incentivizes users to deposit funds with the opportunity to win prizes. In PoolTogether, there are two types of prize pools: those set up by the PoolTogether project and community prize pools that anyone can set up.

fr.name: Pool Together
fr.description: PoolTogether est une application DeFi d'une simplicité étonnante qui propose aux utilisateurs de déposer des fonds avec la possibilité de gagner des prix. Sur PoolTogether, il existe deux types de cagnottes : celles mises en jeu par le projet PoolTogether et les cagnottes communautaires que n'importe qui peut mettre en place.

es.name: Pool Together
es.description: PoolTogether es una aplicación DeFi engañosamente simple que incentiva a los usuarios a depositar fondos con la oportunidad de ganar premios. En PoolTogether, hay dos tipos de pozos de premios: los creados por el proyecto PoolTogether y los pozos de premios de la comunidad que cualquiera puede configurar.

de.name: Pool Together
de.description: PoolTogether is a deceptively simple DeFi app that incentivizes users to deposit funds with the opportunity to win prizes. In PoolTogether, there are two types of prize pools: those set up by the PoolTogether project and community prize pools that anyone can set up.

tr.name: Pool Together
tr.description: PoolTogether, kullanıcıları ödül kazanma fırsatı ile para yatırmaya teşvik eden, aldatıcı derecede basit bir DeFi uygulamasıdır. PoolTogether'da iki tür ödül havuzu vardır: PoolTogether projesi tarafından oluşturulanlar ve herkesin oluşturabileceği topluluk ödül havuzları.
